General.Name: Glotech Industrial
General.Description: Glotech Industrial Corp. produces and sells e-glass fiber fabrics in Taiwan and internationally. It offers fiber glass fabrics and yarns that are used as composite materials. The company was formerly known as A Johnson Composite Inc. and changed its name to Glotech Industrial Corp. in May 2011. Glotech Industrial Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Yangmei, Taiwan.
